role_description: An Ansible role that installs fd (a simple, fast, user-friendly alternative to the find command) on nearly any platform
role_description_full_overview: [fd](https://github.com/sharkdp/fd) is a program that can search for files on your filesystem. It is a simple, fast, and user-friendly alternative to find. While it does not aim to support all of find's powerful functionality, it provides sensible (opinionated) defaults for a majority of use cases.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs fd (a simple, fast, user-friendly alternative to the find command) on nearly any platform.
